name: DGT Community Token
description: "DGT Token strives to become the principal cryptocurrency project launchpad. DGT Token Network aims to be the ultimate DeFi, Community Staking and Liquidity Provider platform, while simultaneously working on becoming the best place for building crypto passive income. Our central purpose is to expose scam projects, guarantee safety to Community Members and instill confidence in the cryptocurrency market in its entirety. Our approach will be to implement methodical smart contract into Agritech Projects, SAAS Tech Products, Gaming Project and Edutech Products launched on the Blockchain in decentralized manner."
